name: Hallow's Village
description:
Hallow's Village is a 3D Game built on the theme of Halloween. The character finds himself in a spooky village. The player has to look around the houses for candies and avoid any encounter with the ghosts. 

The game is not finished yet. But however, you can still play, explore the scene, look for houses with ghosts. We're working on bringing in the complete game as soon as possible.

Till then,  Enjoy this sneak peek into the game. Happy Haunting!
